description: Describes a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: EvaluationId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: Evaluation
nested_items.description: Information about the evaluation form completed for a specific contact.

nested_items.name: EvaluationId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: EvaluationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the contact evaluation resource.

nested_items.name: ContactId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the contact in this instance of Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: EvaluatorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who last updated the evaluation.

nested_items.name: ContactAgentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the agent who performed the contact.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: The score percentage for an item in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: NotApplicable
nested_items.description: The flag to mark the item as not applicable for scoring.

nested_items.name: AutomaticFail
nested_items.description: The flag that marks the item as automatic fail. If the item or a child item gets an automatic fail answer, this flag will be true.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: The string value for an answer in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: NumericValue
nested_items.description: The numeric value for an answer in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: NotApplicable
nested_items.description: The flag to mark the question as not applicable.

nested_items.name: SystemSuggestedValue
nested_items.description: The system suggested value for an answer in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: The string value for an answer in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: NumericValue
nested_items.description: The numeric value for an answer in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: NotApplicable
nested_items.description: The flag to mark the question as not applicable.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The note for an item (section or question) in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: The score percentage for an item in a contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: NotApplicable
nested_items.description: The flag to mark the item as not applicable for scoring.

nested_items.name: AutomaticFail
nested_items.description: The flag that marks the item as automatic fail. If the item or a child item gets an automatic fail answer, this flag will be true.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the evaluation was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the evaluation was last updated.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EvaluationForm
nested_items.description: Information about the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: EvaluationFormVersion
nested_items.description: A version of the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: EvaluationFormId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: EvaluationFormArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the evaluation form resource.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: A title of the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: Items that are part of the evaluation form. The total number of sections and questions must not exceed 100 each. Questions must be contained in a section.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the section.

nested_items.name: RefId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the section. An identifier must be unique within the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: Instructions
nested_items.description: The instructions of the section.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The items of the section.

nested_items.name: Weight
nested_items.description: The scoring weight of the section.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the question.

nested_items.name: Instructions
nested_items.description: The instructions of the section.

nested_items.name: RefId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the question. An identifier must be unique within the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: NotApplicableEnabled
nested_items.description: The flag to enable not applicable answers to the question.

nested_items.name: QuestionType
nested_items.description: The type of the question.

nested_items.name: QuestionTypeProperties
nested_items.description: The properties of the type of question. Text questions do not have to define question type properties.

nested_items.name: MinValue
nested_items.description: The minimum answer value.

nested_items.name: MaxValue
nested_items.description: The maximum answer value.

nested_items.name: Options
nested_items.description: The scoring options of the numeric question.

nested_items.name: MinValue
nested_items.description: The minimum answer value of the range option.

nested_items.name: MaxValue
nested_items.description: The maximum answer value of the range option.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The score assigned to answer values within the range option.

nested_items.name: AutomaticFail
nested_items.description: The flag to mark the option as automatic fail. If an automatic fail answer is provided, the overall evaluation gets a score of 0.

nested_items.name: Automation
nested_items.description: The automation properties of the numeric question.

nested_items.name: PropertyValue
nested_items.description: The property value of the automation.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: The property label of the automation.

nested_items.name: SingleSelect
nested_items.description: The properties of the numeric question.

nested_items.name: Options
nested_items.description: The answer options of the single select question.

nested_items.name: RefId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the answer option. An identifier must be unique within the question.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The title of the answer option.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The score assigned to the answer option.

nested_items.name: AutomaticFail
nested_items.description: The flag to mark the option as automatic fail. If an automatic fail answer is provided, the overall evaluation gets a score of 0.

nested_items.name: DisplayAs
nested_items.description: The display mode of the single select question.

nested_items.name: Automation
nested_items.description: The display mode of the single select question.

nested_items.name: Options
nested_items.description: The automation options of the single select question.

nested_items.name: RuleCategory
nested_items.description: The automation option based on a rule category for the single select question.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category name, as defined in Rules.

nested_items.name: Condition
nested_items.description: The condition to apply for the automation option. If the condition is PRESENT, then the option is applied when the contact data includes the category. Similarly, if the condition is NOT_PRESENT, then the option is applied when the contact data does not include the category.

nested_items.name: OptionRefId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the answer option.

nested_items.name: DefaultOptionRefId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the default answer option, when none of the automation options match the criteria.

nested_items.name: Weight
nested_items.description: The scoring weight of the section.

nested_items.name: ScoringStrategy
nested_items.description: A scoring strategy of the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: The scoring mode of the evaluation form.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The scoring status of the evaluation form.
